model.name: rbm_network
model.description: mapping the skeleton of a restricted Boltzmann machine without the noise sources. The hidden layer and the visible layer are of the same size N.

model.name: pfeilsNoise_network
model.description: mapping the skeleton of a noise network following Pfeil et al. 2016. N inhibitory neuons are connected to themselves exculiding direct self-connections with K presynaptic partners each. The K = 20 is taken from the sampling paper, where a pfeils noise network drives a sampling Restricted Boltzmann Machine.
